alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 03 at 2:07AM CDT until April 03 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN TENSAS...SOUTHWESTERN MADISON AND EASTERN FRANKLIN PARISHES... At 207 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crowville, or 10 miles east of Winnsboro, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Newlight around 215 AM CDT. Newellton, Somerset and Afton around 235 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Gilbert. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
